body: Hi Mostapha, I have a problem to reading epw file with Ladybug as indicated in image below [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Ugvao0mAfe7SRffhX6Fitanm7ZVzOICjHzSI7s4ovFMFAGQaG33zcP-VsLbzsfh8x*IQH*1tg6bCVrR8dngRX*VFtIQARVhO/Ladybug_epw.PNG) Note: I have installed the latest version of Grasshopper, Ladybug and GHpython and also Rhino 5.0 32bit. Can you please help me. Regards Giorgio Butturini

replies.body:
You need to connect the panel with the EPW file to a LB_importEPW component.

Now you are connecting it to LB_Open weather file, which need a boolean component to import the file (see the hint in the component).



And if you are here, i suggest to update to the more recent version (not related to your problem though)

-A.
Thanks for handling this, Abraham.  And, yes, you should update Giorgio!  We have a lot of awesome stuff in the newer version!
